body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**: bug report

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
> /kind bug


**What happened**: log shows KUBE-MARK-DROP not found the bin in windows kubelet, something that doesn't looks fine in windows.

**What you expected to happen**: Just have clean run without these errors?

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: Run kubelet on windows


**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**: on premises
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): v1.10.5
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: on-premises
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Windows server 1803
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 
[environment]::OSVersion.Version

Major  Minor  Build  Revision
-----  -----  -----  --------
10     0      17134  0
- Install tools:
- Others:


logs:

```
I0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 cri_stats_provider.go:276] Unable to find cadvisor stats for sandbox "92da8859d89ecd7a2f0535a505718f9b600290ea6e8b6d6bacac3edcde7b3603"
E0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 cri_stats_provider.go:437] Unable to fetch container log stats for path \var\log\pods\6f16e894-7aca-11e8-b7b3-005056b2c3f5\windowswebserver: Du not supported for this build. 
I0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 cri_stats_provider.go:156] Unable to find cadvisor stats for "50011a4e42aaec5e1438806ad55cff07b31f36768027021bbbad4542ea9b763a"
E0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 helpers.go:739] eviction manager: failed to construct signal: "allocatableMemory.available" error: system container "pods" not found in metrics
I0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 helpers.go:840] eviction manager: observations: signal=memory.available, available: 3128552Ki, capacity: 4193780Ki, time: 2018-07-02 14:14:28.1384741 -0300 -03 m=+350274.555505701
I0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 helpers.go:840] eviction manager: observations: signal=nodefs.available, available: 0, capacity: 0, time: 2018-07-02 14:14:28.1384741 -0300 -03 m=+350274.555505701
I0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 helpers.go:840] eviction manager: observations: signal=imagefs.available, available: 44210492Ki, capacity: 62350332Ki, time: 2018-07-02 14:14:28.507472 -0300 -03
W0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 helpers.go:812] eviction manager: no observation found for eviction signal nodefs.inodesFree
I0702 14:14:30.519446    4788 eviction_manager.go:337] eviction manager: no resources are starved
I0702 14:14:31.019490    4788 kubelet.go:1946] SyncLoop (housekeeping, skipped): sources aren't ready yet.
```

title: KUBE-MARK-DROP not found on windows kubelet stderr
